What we did Working principles

Hypotheses #10

We believe provide a service to automate the recording of the actions teams take to manage risk

We'll see teams with more time to focus on managing risk better as opposed to filling in spreadsheets recording what they’ve done. The information will be more accurate as it records what happens when as opposed to what they remember to include on the risk register

We’ll know this is true when we receive positive feedback from co-ordinators both ad hoc and as part of a quarterly survey

Related hypotheses

None

Considerations

  • What can the system gather and provide without necessitating the user to input significant data?
  • What do the BPs need to be able to see to do their job?
  • Consider the impact on trust and relationships if people’s work is more visible, encourage openness, don’t blame
